channel.title: Data science portfolio on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Data science portfolio on Home

item.title: Building a nutritional app
item.description: Project overview This project consists of evaluating the feasibility of an app that would return the nutriscore label from given features of a food product The overall performance of the trained estimators is significantly positive and confirms the feasibility of such an app Workflow cleaned the product-related data from Open Food Facts database selected relevant features imputed missing values of relevant features with models

item.title: Building sustainable cities
item.description: Project overview this project consists of estimating the model that would predict both CO2 emissions and the energy consumption of non-residential buildings in the city of Seattle thus the project addresses regression problems with tabular data the overall performance of the fitted model is robust and the few features it needs as input allow a clear interpretation of the defined model Workflow cleaned the data

item.title: Clients segmentation
item.description: Project overview this project consists of estimating a segmentation model that would separate the e-consumers of a platform into coherent and business-wise interpretable groups thus the project consists of a clustering task with tabular data the defined clusters are quite robust, well balanced and meaningful in a business-sense Workflow aggregated the tables of the database cleaned the data

item.title: BI project : educational data analysis
item.description: Project overview This project compares countries performance accross several educational-related indicators and produces a ranking with a scoring tool. It may be useful for the method it deploys and to understand how data visualization may be helpful for any BI project.Workflow worked with educational-related data from EdStats World Bank database identified key indicators cleaned the data produced visualizations to compare regions/countries accross chosen indicators over time
